videos.description: A Promised Land is extraordinarily intimate and introspective-the story of one man's bet with history, the faith of a community organizer tested on the world stage.
videos.title: A Promised Land

videos.description: The result is a White House memoir that is the most comprehensive and substantial account of the Trump Administration, and one of the few to date by a top-level official. With almost daily access to the President, John Bolton has produced a precise rendering of his days in and around the Oval Office.
videos.title: The Room Where It Happened: A White House Memoir

videos.description: Greenlights is the fascinating autobiography of Matthew McConaughey in which he takes us on a wild ride of his journey through a childhood of tough love, rising to fame and success in Hollywood, shifting his career, and more, guided by the green lights he saw that led him forward at each step.
videos.title: Greenlights

videos.description: Amor Towles is the author of New York Times bestsellers Rules of Civility and A Gentleman in Moscow. The two novels have collectively sold more than 4 million copies and have been translated into more than thirty languages. Towles lives in Manhattan with his wife and two children.
videos.title: A Gentleman In Moscow

videos.description: Dalam potret wahyu dan otoritatif ini dari Donald J. Trump dan beracun yang membuatnya, Mary L. Trump, seorang psikolog klinis yang terlatih dan satu-satunya keponakan Donald, menyinari cahaya terang pada sejarah gelap keluarga mereka untuk menjelaskan bagaimana caranya Paman menjadi pria yang sekarang mengancam kesehatan dunia, keamanan ekonomi, dan kain sosial. Mary Trump menghabiskan banyak masa kecilnya di rumah kakek-neneknya yang besar dan memaksakan di jantung Queens, New York, di mana Donald dan keempat saudara kandungnya tumbuh. Dia menggambarkan mimpi buruk trauma, hubungan destruktif, dan kombinasi tragis kelalaian dan pelecehan. Dia menjelaskan bagaimana peristiwa spesifik dan pola keluarga umum menciptakan pria yang rusak yang saat ini menempati kantor oval, termasuk hubungan aneh dan berbahaya antara Fred Trump dan dua putra tertua, Fred Jr. dan Donald. Seorang saksi langsung untuk makan dan interaksi liburan yang tak terhitung jumlahnya, Maria membawa kecerdasan yang tajam dan humor tak terduga terkadang suram, sering mengacaukan acara keluarga. Dia menceritakan detail detail segalanya dari tempat paman Donald di penjelasan keluarga dan kegemaran Ivana untuk menyampaikan cedera dan penyakit neneknya dan cara yang mengerikan Donald, putra favorit Fred Trump, diberhentikan dan mengantukunya mulai menyerah pada Alzheimer. Banyak pakar, psikolog kursi, dan wartawan telah berusaha untuk menguraikan kelemahan mematikan Donald J. Trump. Mary L. Trump memiliki pendidikan, wawasan, dan akrab yang diperlukan untuk mengungkapkan apa yang membuat Donald, dan sisa klannya, centang. Dia sendiri dapat menceritakan kisah yang menakjubkan dan menakutkan ini, bukan hanya karena perspektif orang dalam tetapi juga karena dia adalah satu-satunya Trump yang bersedia untuk mengatakan yang sebenarnya tentang salah satu keluarga paling kuat dan tidak berfungsi di dunia.
videos.title: Too Much and Never Enough: How My Family Created the World's Most Dangerous Man

videos.description: Jed introduces Circles with a few thoughts on the nature of friendship. Check out some ways we've been rethinking real-life sharing for the web at plus.google.com.
videos.title: Untamed

videos.description: Fusce id nisi turpis. Praesent viverra bibendum semper. Donec tristique, orci sed semper lacinia, quam erat rhoncus massa, non congue tellus est quis tellus. Ut aliquet luctus lacus. Phasellus nec commodo erat. Praesent tempus id lectus ac scelerisque. Maecenas pretium cursus lectus id volutpat.
videos.title: It Ends with Us: A Novel

videos.description: Fusce id nisi turpis. Praesent viverra bibendum semper. Donec tristique, orci sed semper lacinia, quam erat rhoncus massa, non congue tellus est quis tellus. Sed mollis orci venenatis quam scelerisque accumsan. Curabitur a massa sit amet mi accumsan mollis sed et magna. Vivamus sed aliquam risus. Nulla eget dolor in elit facilisis mattis. Ut aliquet luctus lacus. Phasellus nec commodo erat. Praesent tempus id lectus ac scelerisque. Maecenas pretium cursus lectus id volutpat.
videos.title: Reminders of Him: A Novel

videos.description: Cade Jennings was always there for me when I needed him—until he wasn’t. I’d spent my entire life loving my best friend’s older brother. Every single one of my birthday wishes was spent hoping Cade would finally notice me. And then one day, he did.
videos.title: Rewrite Our Story

videos.description: Seorang wanita yang menjadi tersangka pembunuh suaminya sendiri, dan ia enggan untuk berbicara lagi
videos.title: The Silent Patient

videos.description: Your bum does not look big in that dress.Mmm, it tastes delicious!Of course you’re better looking than Jon Hamm.Newly engaged Natalie Butterworth is an easy-going girl. She’ll do anything for a quiet life and if telling a few teensy white lies keeps her friends and family happy, then so what? It’s not like they’ll ever discover what she’s really thinking… Until one night, thanks to a pub hypnotist.
videos.title: Yours Truly

videos.description: When Edward Cullen and Bella Swan met in Twilight, an iconic love story was born. But until now, fans have heard only Bella's side of the story. At last, listeners can experience Edward's version in the long-awaited companion novel, Midnight Sun.
videos.title: Midnight Sun

videos.description: Aquaman is a 2018 American superhero film based on the DC character of the same name. Co-produced and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures, it is the sixth film in the DC Extended Universe (DCEU). The film was directed by James Wan from a screenplay by David Leslie Johnson-McGoldrick and Will Beall.
videos.title: Aquaman

videos.description: Harriet and Wyn have been the perfect couple since they met in college—they go together like salt and pepper, honey and tea, lobster and rolls. Except, now—for reasons they’re still not discussing—they don’t. They broke up six months ago. And still haven’t told their best friends. Which is how they find themselves sharing the largest bedroom at the Maine cottage that has been their friend group’s yearly getaway for the last decade. Their annual respite from the world, where for one vibrant, blue week they leave behind their daily lives; have copious amounts of cheese, wine, and seafood; and soak up the salty coastal air with the people who understand them most.
videos.title: Happy Place

videos.description: Danna Mendoza Villarreal’s grandfather is slowly losing himself as his memories fade, and Danna’s not sure her plan to help him remember through the foods he once reviewed will be enough to bring him back. Especially when her own love of food makes her complicated relationship with her mother even more difficult.
videos.title: An Appetite for Miracles

videos.description: In her memoir You Could Make This Place Beautiful, poet Maggie Smith explores the disintegration of her marriage and her renewed commitment to herself in lyrical vignettes that shine, hard and clear as jewels. The book begins with one woman’s personal, particular heartbreak, but its circles widen into a reckoning with contemporary womanhood, traditional gender roles, and the power dynamics that persist even in many progressive homes. With the spirit of self-inquiry and empathy she’s known for, Smith interweaves snapshots of a life with meditations on secrets, anger, forgiveness, and narrative itself. The power of these pieces is cumulative: page after page, they build into a larger interrogation of family, work, and patriarchy.
videos.title: You Could Make This Place Beautiful

videos.description: Enter Mia Warren - an enigmatic artist and single mother- who arrives in this idyllic bubble with her teenage daughter Pearl, and rents a house from the Richardsons. Soon Mia and Pearl become more than just tenants: all four Richardson children are drawn to the mother-daughter pair.
videos.title: Little Fires Everywhere: A Novel

videos.description: New ways of sharing the right things with the right people. Join at http://google.com/+
videos.title: Verity

videos.description: Can Drew catch the thief red-handed while staying out of trouble? And what does it mean when everyone around Drew is obsessing over crushes and the upcoming Wonderland dance, and Drew would rather work on her latest crime board?
videos.title: Dune (Dune Chronicles, Book 1)

videos.description: Perjuangan seorang wanita dalam mencari kebahagiaan dan kehidupan yang lebih baik di tengah krisis ekonomi negara
videos.title: The Four Winds: A Novel

videos.description: Buku fiksi anak-anak yang mengikuti petualangan seorang anak yang berusaha menangkap seekor unicorn. Anak tersebut bertanya kepada banyak orang tentang cara menangkap unicorn, namun tidak ada yang bisa memberikan jawaban yang memuaskan
videos.title: How to Catch a Unicorn

videos.description: I Love You to the Moon and Back Book Summary This is a sweet story of a momma bear and her baby cub spending the whole day together and showing all the different ways they can show their love for one another. They show their love for one another by touching noses, playing chase, spending time with friends, and doing a lot of snuggling!
videos.title: I Love You to the Moon and Back

videos.description: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving—every day. James Clear, one of the world's leading experts on habit formation, reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.
videos.title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones

videos.description: menjelaskan tentang filsafat Yunani-Romawi kuno yang bisa membantu Anda mengatasi emosi negatif dan menghasilkan mental yang tangguh dalam menghadapi masalah hidup. Di dalam pimtar ini Anda akan mempelajari definisi Filosofi Teras dan penerapannya dalam kehidupan sehari-hari
videos.title: Filosofi Teras

videos.description: bercerita tentang seseorang yang bernama Charles Bukowski yang mempunyai masa lalu yang kelam, suka mabuk-mabukan, berjudi, mempermainkan wanita, kasar, tukang utang dan seorang penyair.
videos.title: Sebuah Seni untuk Bersikap Bodo Amat

videos.description: There are 48 laws of power and it’s our obligation to know them. The Laws work and, whether we like them or not, we need to know them so they’re not used against us. There’s a reason why this book is banned in most U.S. federal prisons. Greene provides us with historical examples of people who followed the laws, but also the tragic examples of those who dared to ignore them. Learn the laws and apply them according to your own judgment.
videos.title: The 48 Laws of Power

videos.description: Trauma is a fact of life. Veterans and their families deal with the painful aftermath of combat; one in five Americans has been molested; one in four grew up with alcoholics; one in three couples have engaged in physical violence.
videos.title: The Body Keeps the Score: Brain, Mind, and Body in the Healing of Trauma

videos.description: In this very funny, cumulative song, each page tells us something new about the donkey until we end up with a spunky, hanky-panky cranky stinky dinky lanky honky-tonky winky wonky donkey, which will have children in fits of laughter! There is much fun to be had by listening to the song and trying to predict the new word for each clue given!
videos.title: The Wonky Donkey

videos.description: If Animals Kissed Good Night is about a child that wonders how different animals would kiss good night to their families.
videos.title: If Animals Kissed Good Night

videos.description: The Very Hungry Caterpillar is a story about a small caterpillar who emerges from an egg and begins eating everything in sight. After six days of eating fruits, sweets, and “junk” food, he gets a stomach ache. On the seventh day, the caterpillar eats a “nice leaf” and feels much better.
videos.title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar

videos.description: Fan-favorite detective Drew Leclair returns to crack the case of a sneaky locker thief in this heartfelt sequel to the critically acclaimed middle grade mystery series that's been called 'the perfect story for readers ready to progress from Nancy Drew'. (SLJ, starred review).
videos.title: Drew Leclair Crushes the Case

videos.description: A mysterious voice has been speaking to Louise in her dreams. She and her brother Merwin are Sycamore seeds, who hope to one day set down roots and become big trees. But when a fire forces them to leave their mama tree prematurely, they find themselves catapulted into the unknown, far from home.
videos.title: Big Tree

videos.description: Bold, whimsical artwork and plenty of humor engage little ones in a sly and stylish introduction to opposites. This deceptively simple concept book introduces readers to grumpy, old, exhausted Cat, who just wants to be left alone, and to happy, new, energetic Kitty, who longs to make friends.
videos.title: Kitty & Cat: Opposites Attract
